product_name: CliniqueTouch Base For Eyes Eyeshadow Primer
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Touch Base For Eyes is a versatile cream eye shadow that can be worn alone or layered under other eye shadows to give them more staying power.
details: DetailsBenefitsWear alone or layered under other eye shadows as a base.Acts as a holding base for powder shadow. Helps it last longer.No creasing, fading, or smudging.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2153507How To UseUse ring finger to apply primer colour from lashline to brow; blend gently. Can be worn alone or under other eye shadows. Close compact completely to prevent product from drying out. Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes & Lips.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Aluminum Distearate, Octyldodecanol, Ceresin, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire Microcristalline, Hydrated Silica.May Contain: Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Mica, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289), Carmine (CI 75470).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use ring finger to apply primer colour from lashline to brow; blend gently. Can be worn alone or under other eye shadows. Close compact completely to prevent product from drying out. Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes & Lips.
ingredients: Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire Microcristalline

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this product been using it for over 50 years keep it available üëçüíØüôè

reviews.headline: If I could only had 1 makeup item this would be it.
reviews.comments: Touch base is the best eye shadow primer around. I've been using Clinique products for 30 years and I've tried other eyeshadow base products but this one is far superior. It provides soft, smooth coverage and keeps my shadow in place all day. I love that it comes in different colors and it could honestly be worn by itself for a clean smooth look.

reviews.headline: I use this product and recommend it
reviews.comments: Use this product all the time

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: This is an essential for me.  I need a base with aging eyelids to keep my shadow in place, and the tint to this base makes it perfect.  You can use this as a base, or by itself on a day where you don't want to do full makeup, but don't want to go with none.  I like the canvas shade, and the rosey shade.

reviews.headline: Yes, I would buy it again and again!
reviews.comments: I love this base coat for my eyelids!

reviews.headline: Dries out to fast
reviews.comments: Don't let it get unsnapped. Will dry out.

reviews.headline: Great Base color or primer
reviews.comments: I love this primer/base color. It is the color I have been looking for and has a very subtle shimmer which I love. Stays on all day and easy to apply other eyeshadow colors over. I highly recommend. I got Canvas Light.

reviews.headline: I remember this to be different back in the 80's
reviews.comments: Way back in the late 80's my sister had the rose colored primer, and I would "borrow" it from time to time. I remembered it looked so beautiful just on it's own. No eyeshadow even needed. I decided to purchase it, and I was disappointed to see it was just a flat color. I remember it to be a beautiful rose/plum color with a bit of shimmer. In fact, in the product photo here, it looks like it has shimmer... like it did back in the 80's. Did Clinique change the color and not update the product photo?

reviews.headline: Great eyeshadow base; brightens eyes
reviews.comments: This is a great base for your cream or other eyeshadows. a slight golden sheen, but not heavy or glittery. It also works well on its own as a shimmery eye shadow. Depending on how you blend it, I think this would work well on a variety of skin tones, too. Stays put all day. No creasing.

reviews.headline: Pretty color.
reviews.comments: Was disappointed that the color does not transfer to the lids as dark as it appears in the compact. Still, it's a pretty color and I am using it occasionally.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again.
reviews.comments: This is the perfect compact shape for eyeshadow primer, just flip up the mirrored top!  It goes on my mature eyelids like butter, and my shadows always look true to color.  Highly recommended!

reviews.headline: Not what I expected
reviews.comments: I usually love clinique products but this one is a no go. I am 61 and it definitely isnt made for the more aged eye surface. It dries quick and settles in the wrinkles. I have tried applying with finger tips and brush. Will not purchase again.

reviews.headline: Touch Base
reviews.comments: I have been using this for years and I love it. It works great and it isn't greasy.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Use this touch base all the time under my eye shadow. Love it

reviews.headline: So far decent
reviews.comments: Works pretty well. If I don't put shadow on top doesn't seem to last for hours but with shadow pretty good. Does crease a bit but I haven't found a product that doesn't.

reviews.headline: Great Eyeshadow Primer
reviews.comments: I've used this for at least 10 years and it really keeps my eyeshadow on until I wash it off. Canvas Light works the best for me.

reviews.headline: I have been using this product for years.
reviews.comments: I use this product as eyeshadow with a bit of liner. I am 70 and have found less is more at this point. It has a bit of reflective pigment and smooths out the crepe appearance and pink and brown skin coloration. I've used more expensive, fancier products and keep coming back to Canvas.

reviews.headline: Love this primer for mature skin
reviews.comments: After sharing my skin sensitives (especially eyes) with the Clinique representative, she recommend this product which I love! It doesn't irritate my eyes and holds eye shadow well. I typically just wear the primer alone and it looks lovely!

reviews.headline: Too shimmery for a primer - Bring back the Canvas color
reviews.comments: I used to buy this primer in the color "Canvas" for many years and absolutely loved the neutral base primer. Now that a shimmer has been added to "Canvas Light," it is too sparkly to be a base and ruins the other colors of eyeshadow I put over the base.

reviews.headline: Best eye shadow
reviews.comments: Love the Matt finish and how it accentuates my brow bone

media.headline: Everything I Hoped it Would Be
media.caption: With foil seal

faceoff_positive.comments: This is one of the greatest forms of eye makeup out there. I use it as a base for whatever eye shadow I'm using. If you buy a shade near your skin color, it won't distort the color of your eye shadow, but it will keep it from creasing or smearing for literally days, if need be. Whenever I sleep over at a friend's house and don't take my makeup off, my eye makeup still looks great the next morning. I bought this as a gift for my cousin and now she is addicted, too.
faceoff_positive.headline: This is one of the greatest forms of eye makeup out there. I

faceoff_negative.comments: Obviously by looking at the many comments below, you need to return Uplighting Touchbase to your selection stock! I am lost without it!!! I cannot believe you have discontinued this product. Every time I go to a store to purchase the ladies tell me they cannot keep it in stock. If it is that big of a seller, why would you discontinue it?? Terrible marketing in my opinion! And obviously others also. I have been a loyal Clinique customer for 30 years, this is happening more and more every time I go in, you guys changing colors on me. IÔøΩm almost ready to quit using your product!!! That would be sad!!
faceoff_negative.headline: LOST WITHOUT UPLIGHTING TOUCHBASE!!!!
